oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Baptism in the river
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Raymond Perkins, a preacher, baptizing husband and wife Ernest F. Perkins (1913-1994) and Carrie M. Perkins (1915-1999) in the Little River. Raymond Perkins was their uncle. Children not identified. Woman (left, in hat) was Mrs. Lone, mother of Ernest Perkins.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Baptisms; Rivers; Preachers
